title: The Vedas
author: Unknown
description: A collection of ancient Indian texts.

title: Upanishads
author: Various Sages
description: Philosophical texts that explore the meaning of existence.

title: Mahabharata
author: Vyasa
description: One of the greatest Indian epics that narrates the Kurukshetra War.

title: Ramayana
author: Valmiki
description: The story of Lord Rama's journey and battle against Ravana.

title: Bhagavad Gita
author: Krishna (Narrator), Vyasa (Compiler)
description: A spiritual and philosophical conversation between Lord Krishna and Arjuna.

title: Puranas
author: Various Authors
description: Ancient stories that explain the history of gods, sages, and the universe.

title: Charaka Samhita
author: Charaka
description: One of the oldest texts on Ayurveda and ancient Indian medicine.

title: Sushruta Samhita
author: Sushruta
description: A classical text on surgery and medical practices in ancient India.

title: Arthashastra
author: Chanakya
description: An ancient Indian treatise on economics, politics, and military strategy.

title: Natya Shastra
author: Bharata Muni
description: A classical Sanskrit text on theatre, dance, and music.
